SELECT_FILE_TO_UPLOAD: Select a file from your computer to upload.
DELETE_FILE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the file "{{fileName}}"?

ERRORS.UNEXPECTED: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
ERRORS.VALIDATION_ERROR: There were validation errors with your request.
ERRORS.INVALID_FILE_EXTENSION: The file extension is not allowed.
ERRORS.INVALID_CONTENT_TYPE: The content type of the file is not supported.
ERRORS.FILE_TOO_LARGE: The file size exceeds the allowed limit.
ERRORS.FILE_STREAM_NOT_READABLE: The file could not be read properly.
ERRORS.FILE_NOT_FOUND: The requested file was not found.
ERRORS.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS: A file with the same name already exists.
ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED_FILE_ACCESS: You do not have permission to access this file.
ERRORS.FILE_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE: The file service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
